steps.description: Go to Lake Rathetear and speak to Rykas. Say 'I wish to learn of the tale of Magi'kot' to receive Power of the Orb.
Go to Castle Mistmoore and kill a gypsy dancer to loot Power of Wind.
Go to Solusek's Eye and kill blazing or lava elementals to loot Power of Fire.
Go to Lesser Faydark and kill fairies to loot Power of Earth.
Go to Kaesora and kill ravenar mobs to loot Power of Water.
Give Power of Wind, Power of Fire, Power of Earth, and Power of Water to Walnan in Butcherblock Mountains to receive Power of the Elements.
Go to Najena and kill magician dark elf mobs to loot Torn Page of Mastery Earth, Torn Page of Mastery Water, Torn Page of Mastery Wind, and Torn Page of Mastery Fire.
Give the four Torn Pages of Mastery to Akkstaff in Najena to receive Words of Mastery.
Go to Kithicor Forest and kill wolf type mobs at night to loot Torn Page of Magi'kot pg. 1.
Go to Estate of Unrest and kill a tentacle terror or a dark terror to loot Torn Page of Magi'kot pg. 2.
Go to Lower Guk and kill a bloodthirsty ghoul to loot Torn Page of Magi'kot pg. 3.
Give Jahsohn Aksot in Commonlands the 3x Torn Pages of Magi'kot to receive Words of Magi'Kot.
Give Power of the Elements, Words of Mastery, and Words of Magi'Kot to Rykas in Lake Rathetear to receive Power of the Orb.
Go to Burning Woods and kill Nezekezena, Phurzikon, or Gylton to loot Burning Embers.
Go to Kedge Keep and kill Undertow to loot Blazing Wand.
Go to City of Mist and kill Neh'Ashirr to loot Torch of the Elements.
Give Burning Embers, Blazing Wand, Torch of the Elements, and Power of the Orb to Jennus Lyklobar in Skyfire Mountains to receive Element of Fire.
